name: TheAtlantic
text: "Young Abraham Lincoln argued that defiance of the law endangers us all. His point was that one cannot claim to support the rule of law while also ignoring it," @NPRinskeep writes: https://t.co/RiWgINQeYx

name: TheAtlantic
text: "No one should feign surprise or disbelief that academics write to me with great frequency to share their anxieties. In a three-week period early this summer, I counted some 150 of these messages," @JohnHMcWhorter writes: https://t.co/KCPsIO370J

name: TheAtlantic
text: Herd immunity is a concept that guides vaccine policy to prevent outbreaks, writes @JamesHamblin. It is not an approach to ending a global pandemic. https://t.co/nfSRRCtLLX

name: TheAtlantic
text: In defeating Joe Kennedy, long-serving Massachusetts senator Ed Markey turned his biggest vulnerability into an opportunity, @russellberman writes: https://t.co/2GqP7E0S5b

name: TheAtlantic
text: Twenty-five years ago in Beijing, @HillaryClinton declared that "women's rights are human rights." Here’s the full speech as she delivered it. https://t.co/dPOsQ96L1p

name: TheAtlantic
text:
While COVID-19 researchers have extolled the virtues of masks and the necessity of ventilation, "another behavioral tactic hasn’t received enough attention, in part because it makes itself known by its absence," @DKThomp writes. "That tactic is silence."
https://t.co/fWQebB8iqU

name: TheAtlantic
text: Publishing student writing shifts students from consumers to creators of stories. LaQuisha Hall, a Baltimore educator, has guided more than 100 students to becoming published authors, @mdawriter reports: https://t.co/XBQlzGKF1w

name: TheAtlantic
text: This year’s national reckoning over policing means that more Americans could stand to seriously listen to the music of Drakeo the Ruler and other young rappers who have been incarcerated, Hannah Giorgis writes. https://t.co/mgEXX0TrKu

name: TheAtlantic
text: Publishing student writing shifts students from consumers to creators of stories. LaQuisha Hall, a Baltimore educator, has guided more than 100 students to becoming published authors, @mdawriter reports: https://t.co/Be3zNIRlFJ
